text:
sOmA#ya pitRuqmatE# purOqDASaq(gm)q ShaTka#pAlaqM nirva#pati piqtRuByO# bar.hiqShadByO# dhAqnAH piqtRuByO$&gniShvAqttEByO# &BivAqnyA#yai duqgdhE maqnthamEqtat tE# tataq yE caq tvAmanvEqtat tE# pitAmaha prapitAmahaq yE caq tvAmanvatra# pitarO yathABAqgaM ma#ndaddhva(gm)susaqdRuMSa#M tvA vaqyaM maGa#van mandiShIqmahi# | 
pranUqnaM pUqrNava#ndhuraH stuqtO yA#siq vaSAq(gm)q anu# | 
yOjAqnvi#ndra tEq harI$ || 7
